item.title: Ocaliva for PBC Withdrawn From US Market
item.description: Intercept Pharmaceuticals has voluntarily pulled Ocaliva (obeticholic acid) from the US market following a request from the FDA. The agency also place...

item.title: Study Links Calcium Crystals to Future Knee OA
item.description: Knee calcium crystal deposition may drive osteoarthritis development, pointing to possible interventions for high-risk patients. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Pregabalin Tied to Elevated Heart Failure Risk
item.description: A widely used medication for chronic pain has been linked to an increased risk for heart failure, new research shows. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Sequential Therapies Counter Bariatric Surgery Bone Loss
item.description: Study may hint at what is the best treatment length for denosumab in bariatric surgery patients. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Gender and Stigma Negatively Affect Mental Health in HIV
